item.title: [HELP] [REP++] How Do U Make NPCS Talk In DeltaSource [HELP]
item.dc:creator: @Jordiescape Jordiescape
item.description:
@Jordiescape wrote:

[quote=“pistolse, post:4, topic:235876”]ROFLLMFAO. Did you add that exact code roflsz?

no i didnt retard thats just a example,

[code]Search;

“moo”, And add it under that,
All moparscapian servers are the same.[/code]

Well deltas are different he changed many methods/voids and shit [br][br][size=1]Posted on: October 09, 2008, 03:06:46 pm[/size][hr]so there is no “moo” in his[/quote]
I’m the retard? You’re the one avoiding using common sense and is asking how to make NPCs talk.
It’s pretty obvious he removed NPC talk because it lags. Just find the correct method to add it under.

item.title: [HELP] [REP++] How Do U Make NPCS Talk In DeltaSource [HELP]
item.dc:creator: @pistolse pistolse
item.description:
@pistolse wrote:

going to try it now[br][br][size=1]Posted on: October 09, 2008, 04:23:41 pm[/size][hr]no dang dident work but thank you for trying ! :([br][br][size=1]Posted on: October 09, 2008, 04:27:42 pm[/size][hr]i tried to add it i dident get any errors but the npc aint saying anything[br][br][size=1]Posted on: October 09, 2008, 04:28:52 pm[/size][hr]look like this btw npcs[i].animNumber = 2732; } else if (npcs[i].npcType == 142) { npcs[i].animNumber = 78; } else if (npcs[i].npcType == 49) { println("setting emote.."); npcs[i].animNumber = 161; } else { npcs[i].animNumber = 0x900; // human dead } if (npcs[i].npcType == 1078) { if (misc.random2(30) <= 2) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "You Need A Spade To Digg You Into The Barrows Coffins!"; } }

item.title: [HELP] [REP++] How Do U Make NPCS Talk In DeltaSource [HELP]
item.dc:creator: @Cloud7Strife Cloud7Strife
item.description:
@Cloud7Strife wrote:

Blah I know very little about Delta Source but for how many problems you got with it it seems very bad >.< but I will try to assist you in this first…

go to npchandler

Ctrl+F this

AttackNPC(i);

Im not sure with you’re server but their may be some things after it

[color=red]Find the very end of the attack npc crap like mine ends with

} else if (i == 96) { npcs[i].attacknpc = 97; npcs[i].IsUnderAttackNpc = true; npcs[97].IsUnderAttackNpc = true; AttackNPC(i); } */

[color=red]That’s just the end of mine now under all that attack npc FIND THE LAST { or }
then add this in…

if (npcs[i].npcType == NPC ID THAT YOU WANT TO SAY THE TEXT) { if (misc.random2(30) <= 2) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "TEXT GOES HERE"; } }

Then put in whatever text you want… obviously then the npc id…

Do the following for any other ones…

Most servers actually would have this code for the beginning of the npc talk thing

} if (npcs[i].npcType == 81 || npcs[i].npcType == 397 || npcs[i].npcType == 1766 || npcs[i].npcType == 1767 || npcs[i].npcType == 1768) { if (misc.random2(50) == 1) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "Moo"; } }

soooo I dunno but try the guid above if that doesn’t work ill try to make it more detailed…

Read full topic

item.title: [HELP] [REP++] How Do U Make NPCS Talk In DeltaSource [HELP]
item.dc:creator: @pistolse pistolse
item.description:
@pistolse wrote:

uhmm are u sure that will work for deltas source?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: October 09, 2008, 03:27:31 pm[/size][hr][code]okay, go to npchandler.java

then find something like this then add it

if (npcs.npcType == PUTHERENPCID) {
if (misc.random2(22) == 1) {
npcs.updateRequired = true;
npcs.textUpdateRequired = true;
npcs.textUpdate = “blablablabla…”;
}
}[/code]

i tried to just search;: "(npcs.npcType == " didnt find anything!

item.description:
@sabsabi wrote:

okay, go to npchandler.java

then find something like this then add it

if (npcs[i].npcType == PUTHERENPCID) {
if (misc.random2(22) == 1) {
npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
npcs[i].textUpdate = “blablablabla…”;
}
}

item.title: [HELP] [REP++] How Do U Make NPCS Talk In DeltaSource [HELP]
item.dc:creator: @I_Br3ndan_I I Br3ndan I
item.description:
@I_Br3ndan_I wrote:

No. I’m sure he just removed “moo” since it is completely unnecessary. Go into npcHandler.Java and find the NPC speech area; merely search for “[size=14pt]"[/size]” repeatedly and you’ll find it eventually.

G’luck.

well its not like the normal server like
add this in npchandler.java

if (npcs[i].npcType == NPCID) { if (misc.random2(30) <= 2) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "WHAT YOU WANT IT TO SAY!"; }
